attributes.action: Maintain a right of way that has been used for over 20 years
attributes.background: The pathway next to union place car park chatham has been illegally blocked by fencing from construction next door. This has been used for over 20 years by children, teenagers and vulnerable adults using the local nurseries, schools, theatre and youth education services.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
